name: Cat & Mouse Dairy Quest
description:
Game made for Brackeys 2021.1 Game Jam. Theme: Stronger Together.

The evil lactose intolerant king has banished all dairy products. But the mouse who loves cheese and the cat who loves milk are mad about this. They want to start a revolution but get thrown into the dungeon by the evil king. Escape the dungeon and defeat the king!

Developer: Nuffuru - 15-year old from Belgium that tries to make games :)

(This is my first time participating in a game jam and also my first time working on a 2D project for more than a few hours)
